channel.title: Homes on Diogenet
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Diogenet

item.description: Introduction Diogenet is a dataset and tool for the investigation of the impact of social ties on the construction and diffusion of knowledge in ancient Greece. The main theoretical approach at the foundations of Diogenet is formal social network analysis, a branch of anthropology and sociology. Accordingly, we use the concepts of network, nodes and ties, to study the relations that linked a large number of intellectuals of the ancient world.
